mermaid_code:
%%{init: {'theme': 'base'}}%%
graph LR
    A[Input Image] --> B[Convolutional Layer 1]
    B --> C[ReLU 1]
    C --> D[Pooling Layer 1]
    D --> E[Convolutional Layer 2]
    E --> F[ReLU 2]
    F --> G[Pooling Layer 2]
    G --> H[Flatten]
    H --> I[Fully Connected Layer 1]
    I --> J[ReLU 3]
    J --> K[Fully Connected Layer 2]
    K --> L[Output Layer (e.g., Softmax)]
